description.zh-CN: 交互式焦点导航组件，允许用户通过点击按钮改变网页上的焦点位置。支持平滑滚动、进度追踪和多个变体设计。
description.en-US: Interactive focus navigator component that allows users to change focus position on the webpage by clicking buttons. Supports smooth scrolling, progress tracking, and multiple design variants.

description.zh-CN: 简洁的焦点导航设计，包含顶部进度标签、章节按钮和上/下导航按钮。适合简单的多章节内容。
description.en-US: Clean focus navigation design with top progress label, section buttons, and up/down navigation buttons. Perfect for simple multi-section content.

description.zh-CN: 功能丰富的焦点导航设计，包含侧边栏导航、进度条、章节徽章和视觉反馈。适合复杂的多部分应用。
description.en-US: Feature-rich focus navigation design with sidebar navigation, progress bar, section badges, and visual feedback. Perfect for complex multi-section applications.
